div.p: Well I will write you again this P. M. I am feeling fine and hope you are also I havent heard from any one at home yet But guess the time seems longer to me than it really is Will soon be two months since i left the states Say how did every body in Jackson hear we had

left the states. Carl had a letter from Lena Schwab and she said they heard we had left the states long before the cards got there we are still having lots of fun loading the German big shells They have been falling in sight all day and real close to where some of the boys are working But listen I want to tell you something that will make you laugh I know. I am a cook can you believe such a thing. Well I didnt either but I am a cook just the same Well ever body has to learn so here goes I am trying any way I am in a little town so the Germans dont shoot the town up. But they come real close some times The aeroplances fly over us ever day they are getting so common I dont notice them much They have battles in the air here and the other day when we were eating dinner

They brought a German plane down. Lots of fun. We are between the us and them
and when the Americans get to shelling the Germans we have some noise believe me

There was one night didnt any body sleep any I dont think, we shelled the Germans all night we are going to mop up with these Germans in time for me to get home and eat Christmas dinner with you and I will be awful hungry to

So you will have to cook lots of Turkey Well what is going on in the city. Now much of any thing. I would guess But I wouldnt know how to act if I was to be turned aloose again and told to do as I wanted to.
But some day I will and I can have a good time to. A lot easier than I could before I joined the army Do you ever hear from Ester since she got married

and left the city. Who do you get to go to town with you now? I cant think of any body that was as close as she was what has become of Lynn? Is he still at Millington or has he moved a long ways from home. They always get a fellow as far away from home as possible. Well write me a long letter and tell me all the news I cant think of any thing else I can tell now so will quit. answer real soon
